feed.subtitle: 人之初,性本D,誰でも大好き

entry.title: vtb机翻 2020.4.2
entry.content: 手机上直接用termu目前搞不了，建议白嫖谷歌云来玩

entry.title: 继上文安装额外硬盘
entry.content:
自行设置好额外硬盘，我这里建立了sdb，

sudo lsblk
NAME   MAJ:MIN RM  SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINT
sda      8:0    0   50G  0 disk 
└─sda1   8:1    0   50G  0 part /
sdb      8:16   0  500G  0 disk

先格式化

sudo mkfs.ext4 -m 0 -E lazy_itable_init=0,lazy_journal_init=0,discard /dev/sdb

设置装载目录

sudo mkdir -p /mnt/disks/sdb

我这里把它挂载到装载目录/mnt/disks/sdb，如需更换请自行替换下面的 /mnt/disks/sdb

sudo mount -o discard,defaults /dev/sdb /mnt/disks/sdb

配置读写权限

sudo chmod a+w /mnt/disks/sdb

sudo lsblk
NAME   MAJ:MIN RM  SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINT
sda      8:0    0   50G  0 disk 
└─sda1   8:1    0   50G  0 part /
sdb      8:16   0  500G  0 disk /mnt/disks/sdb

完

entry.title: 谷歌云仅启动盘扩容
entry.content:
首先在Computer Engine》硬盘扩大启动盘容量

连接到实例

sudo lsblk
NAME   MAJ:MIN RM  SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINT
sda      8:0    0   50G  0 disk 
└─sda1   8:1    0   20G  0 part /

安装 growpart

Debian
sudo apt -y install cloud-guest-utils
CentOS 
sudo yum -y install cloud-utils-growpart

扩展分区

sudo growpart /dev/sda1
CHANGED: partition=1 start=2048 old: size=41939040 end=41941088 new: size=104855519,end=104857567

系统格式为ext4则

sudo resize2fs /dev/sda1

系统格式为xfs则

sudo xfs_growfs /
#这里的  /  是上面
sda      8:0    0   50G  0 disk 
└─sda1   8:1    0   20G  0 part /
中的  /
请自行替换
meta-data=/dev/sda1              isize=512    agcount=8, agsize=655296 blks
                 =                       sectsz=4096  attr=2, projid32bit=1
                 =                       crc=1        finobt=1, sparse=1, rmapbt=0
                 =                       reflink=1
data          =                       bsize=4096   blocks=5242368, imaxpct=25
                 =                       sunit=0      swidth=0 blks
naming     =version 2              bsize=4096   ascii-ci=0, ftype=1
log            =internal log           bsize=4096   blocks=2560, version=2
                  =                       sectsz=4096  sunit=1 blks, lazy-count=1
realtime     =none                   extsz=4096   blocks=0, rtextents=0
data blocks changed from 5242368 to 13106939

sudo df -h /dev/sda1
Filesystem      Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
/dev/sda1        50G   10G   40G  20% /

完

entry.title: 不要随便把ubuntu自带python给卸载了
entry.content:

entry.title: termux-packages编译python3.6 （全部木大）
entry.content:
本段接上篇,可能有点问题请自行处理

用不了

用不了

用不了

你可能会做无用功

cd /root/lib/
wget -c https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r17c-linux-x86_64.zip
mv android-ndk android-ndk-8
mv android-ndk-r17c-linux-x86_64.zip android-ndk.zip
unzip android-ndk.zip
apt remove python3

安装python3.6

sudo apt install openssl* zlib*
sudo wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.8/Python-3.6.8.tgz
sudo tar -xzvf Python-3.6.8.tgz
cd Python-3.6.8
sudo ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/python --with-ssl --enable-optimizations
#安装到/usr/local/python目录
#不用事先创建python目录
sudo make && sudo make install
#编译&&安装
sudo ln -s /usr/local/python/bin/python3.6 /usr/bin/python3
sudo ln -s /usr/local/python/bin/pip3.6 /usr/bin/pip3
#创建python与pip软连接

自此以后请尽量一次完成，之后的SSH通过浏览器可能连接不上了，用手机倒是可以
请提前设置好root登录，
也可能只是我的问题

mv termux-packages termux-packages-a
git clone https://github.com/termux/termux-packages.git
mv termux-packages termux-packages-b
mv termux-packages-a termux-packages
cp -a termux-packages termux-packages-bak
cd termux-packages
git reset --hard 3f342b02e27bafa391fb5cd0ef356bce13f3f8bd
cd 
git checkout termux-packages
sudo apt-get install libncurses5
./termux-packages/build-package.sh python
vi termux-packages/packages/ca-certificates/build.sh
adf770dfd574a0d6026bfaa270cb6879b063957177a991d453ff1d302c02081f
./termux-packages/build-package.sh python

cp termux-packages-b/packages/libbz2/build.sh termux-packages/packages/libbz2/

然而还是用不了，termux安装不上python3.6

终结

ubuntu18安装最新nodejs
https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_34221036/article/details/91421667

entry.title: 运用termux-packages编译termux用包
entry.content:
GCP ubuntu19

apt-get update
apt-get upgrade
apt-get install nodejs -y
apt-get install npm -y
sudo npm install -g node-gyp
git clone https://github.com/termux/termux-packages.git
vi termux-packages/scripts/setup-ubuntu.sh

$SUDO DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive \
	apt-get install -yq --no-install-recommends $PACKAGES
改为
$SUDO apt-get install -yq --no-install-recommends $PACKAGES
./termux-packages/scripts/setup-android-sdk.sh
touch /root/.android/repositories.cfg
./termux-packages/scripts/setup-android-sdk.sh
./termux-packages/build-package.sh python

entry.title: 在手机上通过termux实现vtb机翻（未完成）
entry.content:
youtube-streaming-translator-python
我这里的环境termux aarch64 python3.8
大体上来说，报错可以直接下离线包,我这里只是我的情况
请自行随机应变
离线包记得改对应的名字
首先下载termux
还是用魔改的uTermux吧，原版太麻烦了
左划换清华源，一直y就对了，大概

pkg install python
pip install --upgrade pip
git clone https://github.com/azuse/youtube-streaming-translator-python
cd https://github.com/azuse/youtube-streaming-translator-python
pip install -r requiremments.txt

这里安装opencv-python报错了，我选择了安装离线包
自己下吧https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple/opencv-python/

pip install opencv_python-4.2.0.32-cp38-none-linux_aarch64.whl
pip install -r requiremments.txt

下面不重复了，解决错误后继续

pip install -r requiremments.txt

安装scipy又报错了

pkg install wget
$PREFIX/bin/wget https://its-pointless.github.io/setup-pointless-repo.sh 
bash setup-pointless-repo.sh
apt install scipy

安装grpcio又报错了,依旧是离线包
https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple/grpcio/

pip install grpcio-1.28.0rc3-cp38-none-linux_aarch64.whl

安装pyaudio又报错了

pkg install portaudio
pip install pyaudio

安装scikit-learn又报错了
https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple/scikit-learn/

pip install scikit_learn-0.22rc3-cp38-none-linux_aarch64.whl

安装llvmlite又报错了
https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple/llvmlite/

pip install llvmlite-0.31.0-cp38-none-linux_aarch64.whl

环境方面我到这里已经没有再报错了
安装SOX

pip install SOX

添加谷歌api key到Path中

export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="[PATH]"
#例:export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="/home/user/Downloads/service-account-file.json"

如果是用百度翻译API的话，
修改main.google.py中约245行中把baidu设置为baidu=True
默认似乎是true的，用谷歌翻译API的话应该改为false吧

vi main.google.py
#滑到245行，按i输入，完成后先Esc在ZZ(自己输入法那里的Z按两遍)

运行脚本

python main.google.py

报错了

pkg install opencv

python main.google.py

Traceback (most recent call last): 
File "main.google.py", line 23, in <module>               from google.cloud import speech_v1p1beta1 as speech   
File "/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/cloud/speech_v1p1beta1/__init__.py", line 19, in <module>                                        from google.cloud.speech_v1p1beta1.gapic import speech_client                                                 
File "/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/cloud/speech_v1p1beta1/gapic/speech_client.py", line 24, in <module>                             import google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info           
File "/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/api_core/gapic_v1/__init__.py", line 16, in <module>                                             from google.api_core.gapic_v1 import config          
 File "/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/api_core/gapic_v1/config.py", line 23, in <module>                                               import grpc                                           
 File "/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/grpc/__init__.py", line 23, in <module>         from grpc._cython import cygrpc as _cygrpc          
 ImportError: cannot import name 'cygrpc' from 'grpc._cython' (/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/grpc/_cython/__init__.py)

我没辙了，先这样吧，有空在搞
2020年3月26日21:22:34
开始这些捣鼓为3月2日，完

封面地址
